com.mesosphere.sdk.offer.taskdata

Class AuxLabelAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.offer.taskdata.AuxLabelAccess

  • public final class AuxLabelAccess
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for adding labels to Mesos protobufs other than Protos.TaskInfo.

    If you're accessing labels in Protos.TaskInfos, you should be using TaskLabelReader and/or TaskLabelWriter.

    • Method Detail

      • setResourceId

        public static void setResourceId(Protos.Resource.ReservationInfo.Builder reservationBuilder,
                                 java.lang.String resourceId)
        Assigns a resource ID label to the provided reservation.
        Parameters:
        reservationBuilder - the reservation where labels should be added
        resourceId - a unique id for tracking the reservation

      • getResourceId

        public static java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getResourceId(Protos.Resource.ReservationInfo reservation)
        Returns the unique resource id which can be used for uniquely identifying this reservation, or an empty optional if none is present. This label should always be present in reservations which were created by the SDK.

      • setFrameworkId

        public static void setFrameworkId(Protos.Resource.ReservationInfo.Builder reservationBuilder,
                                  java.lang.String frameworkId)
        Assigns a framework ID label to the provided reservation.
        Parameters:
        reservationBuilder - the reservation where labels should be added
        frameworkId - a unique id representing the framework

      • getFrameworkId

        public static java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getFrameworkId(Protos.Resource.ReservationInfo reservation)
        Returns the unique resource id which can be used for uniquely identifying this reservation, or an empty optional if none is present. This label should always be present in reservations which were created by the SDK.

      • setResourceNamespace

        public static void setResourceNamespace(Protos.Resource.ReservationInfo.Builder reservationBuilder,
                                        java.lang.String namespace)
        Assigns a service namespace to the pvrovided reservation.
        Parameters:
        reservationBuilder - the reservation where labels should be added
        namespace - a namespace to be assigned

      • getResourceNamespace

        public static java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getResourceNamespace(Protos.Resource.ReservationInfo reservation)
        Returns the service name embedded in the reservation, or an empty optional if none is present. This label is only present in reservations which were created in SDK 0.50 or later.

      • setDcosSpace

        public static void setDcosSpace(Protos.ExecutorInfo.Builder executorInfoBuilder,
                                java.lang.String dcosSpace)

      • setVIPLabels

        public static void setVIPLabels(Protos.Port.Builder portBuilder,
                                NamedVIPSpec namedVIPSpec)
        Updates the provided Protos.Port to contain the provided VIP information. This is the inverse of #getVIPsFromLabels(String, org.apache.mesos.Protos.Port).

      • getVIPsFromLabels

        public static java.util.Collection<EndpointUtils.VipInfo> getVIPsFromLabels(java.lang.String taskName,
                                                                            Protos.Port port)
        Returns the VIP information, if any, within the provided Protos.Port. This is the inverse of #setVIPLabels(org.apache.mesos.Protos.Port.Builder, NamedVIPSpec).
